english.segment1: You know my motives. You know my heart. No matter what I'm doin'. You see my secrets. Right through the dark. Who do I think I'm foolin'?. You watch me runnin'. You let me hide. 'cause you know where I'm goin'..to
english.segment2: Seeking me. Reaching me. Keeping me in your care, lord. I can't escape it
english.segment3: 1st chorus: You don't miss a thing I do. You see every move I make. But you know everything I need. You don't let a care get by you. You don't miss a thing, do you?
english.segment4: When my heart's broken. You dry my tears. 'cause you know what I'm feelin'. When I am frozen. You melt my fears. Your gentle love is healing. You feed my hunger. You quench my thirst. 'cause you are my provider
english.segment5: Leading me. Teaching me. Keeping me in your care, lord. I can't escape it
english.segment6: 2nd chorus: You don't miss a thing I do. You see every move I make. You know everything I need. You don't let a dare get by you. You hear every word I say. I will never go unnoticed. 'cause you don't miss a thing, do you?. (repeat)
english.segment7: You don't miss a thing..no, no, no..
